name: Escape from Tarkov Pt. 1
description: What do you want Merc? Now you come crawling in here after all the trouble you caused wanting a way out of Tarkov? Tough luck. There isn't an easy way out now. Didn't you hear? The borders are locked down. You got a better chance of killing every other scav in the zone before you get through the military checkpoints. What do you even bring to the table? You just want a ride out for free? You're gonna have to help me out before I do anything for you. Some of my boys were supposed to be bringing me a shipment. Took a path through the woods. Find their convoy and get back to me either with an update or the missing gear. Don't bother coming back till you got something for me.
success_message: Hm, You mercs must be desperate. At least you are. I have some more work for you. Talk to the Doctor about it. If you keep up the good work, I will see what I can find for you.

missions.message: Recover some ammo for the AKs

name: Escape from Tarkov Pt. 2
description: So, old Pavel is actually giving a mercenary work? Strange times. I could care less who you are and what you want. I have an oath to uphold. I try to help any injured or sick that come to my clinic. Supplies are a bit low and I could use a re-stock. Specifically, I need anti-biotics, saline, and morphine. I've heard of an abandoned building in the customs area that was converted to a makeshift clinic a while ago then abandoned once that gang moved in to the neighboring stronghold. It might be the best spot to find what I need.
success_message: I appreciate the help. I'll put in a good word with Pavel. And take these. Should help protect you at least a little

name: Escape from Tarkov Pt.3
description: I think I may have a lead on a kind of way out. But I'm gonna need some things to find out if its legitimate. Also have some work I need done. Go down to the area around the hospital and check out the beach and pier. Let me know what you find. I also need some information from the offices down at the docks. Besides that, I would like a bit of revenge for my boys. Take care of some scavs in the woods area. Teach them a little lesson in respect. Get back to me once you have the intel. Good luck.
success_message: Okay, I will start going over the intel. I appreciate you avenging my boys. Heres a little something to play around with. You'll have to search around for ammo but it should be a fun toy. Come back to me in a couple days.

missions.message: Check out the offices by the pier in the Shoreline zone
Find some intel in the offices
Eliminate 5 Scavs in the Woods area

name: Compiling Data
description: Look, keep it quiet, but I know you want out of Tarkov. I might be able to help, but It wouldn't be a good look for a UN official to be smuggling out mercs understand? I wouldn't trust Prapor, he isn't a bad guy, but it wouldn't suprise me if he was using you. Just tread with caution. I didn't say anything. I figure the only way out of here is with information. The most valuable commodity. You might be able to negotiate a pass with the Russian government if you got enough strong intel on the Terragroup. I know Terragroup had operations all over Tarkov, I would suggest checking around their operating areas and seeing if you can find anything incriminating. If you will bring it to me, I will help you organize everything.
success_message: Well, what did you find? -- They were smuggling shit out of the customs? Probably from that factory. -- Terragroup cargo in the hospital? -- And a bunch of dead scavs around their outpost near the lighthouse? Fucking strange. -- Laboratory? What the fuck were they doing there? -- You found these injectors there? Very interesting. I wonder what they do. -- Human Testing? You're sure? We will need hard evidence but that would be damning for sure. I'll think on our next step but I have a job we can discuss in a moment. Lets organize all of what we have.

missions.message: Look into Terragroup activity near the Lighthouse
Look into Terragroup activity around the chemical factory in the Customs zone
Look into Terragroup activity in the hospital around the Shoreline
